.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements-image-parameter]] pname:image must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements-pMemoryRequirements-parameter]] pname:pMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkMemoryRequirements structure
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements-image-parent]] pname:image must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
